item.description:
Meeting time: 11 AM
meeting place: Main Street Cafe, 42 Main Street, Concord

This is in response to folks' interest in a group ride this coming Sunday, Mar. 28. I've never organized a meetup before, so I'm just grabbing the bull by the horns! Hopefully the weather will be nice; I don't have a specific itinerary or route in mind, although I do know the area to some extent.
My thought is that we can all meet in downtown Concord, and then ride around Concord and over to Lincoln, which is surprisingly bucolic, quiet, and free of traffic.
some options in the area to explore or see along the way:

Lincoln Conservation Land area (along rte 117, I think)
Great Meadows in Concord
Decordova Museum
Walden Pond
Gropius House

We can either break for lunch in Concord or grab a bite afterwards; whatever people decide.
If anyone has a good bike trail map or ideas for specific routes to take, feel free to bring them!
I have a car and bike rack (for one extra bike) if anyone needs a ride!

Cheers--
Natalie
item.how_to_find_us: I'm fairly tall with red/auburn hair
item.name: Concord/Lincoln ride--meet at 11 AM for approx 2-3 hr ride
